about_the_game:
This game demo is a shooter/survival game, it has features including driving shooting weapons and swimming as well as a full building and resources system as well as a full damage/health system including drowning when underwater, it also has a day/night system with full random changeable weather, you can use a pickaxe to collect stone and metal ore, and also use an axe for chopping down trees for the for use with the building component, the game demo has a full inventory system and the user interface is fully customisable with the sound and graphics as well as changing the input controls.

This will be a free demo at first in the hope it gains more interest to add more features and levels plus different abilities at a later stage, the current demo has 1 level which has a score counter as well as a timer for completing the game level, along with how many foes are left in the game.

This demo was built entirely in Epic's unreal Engine 5.03

Credits

Music and sound:- Iestyn Davis
UI and graphics:- Hristo Itchov
As well as the following from Epic Marketplace
Survival Game Kit V2 for the main character
Smart AI for the aliens
Paragon Twinblast
Paragon Sevarog
Assetville Town for the game map
Military Weap Silv for aded explosions and gun sounds
Sci fi sound pack for alien weapons and alien sounds in general
Ultra dynamic Sky for the day/night system as well as Weather system
Drivable Cars: Advanced Multiplayer Pack For the vehicles obviously
Breakable Glass, for obviously the breakable glass.
Easy Swim component.
detailed_description:
This game demo is a shooter/survival game, it has features including driving shooting weapons and swimming as well as a full building and resources system as well as a full damage/health system including drowning when underwater, it also has a day/night system with full random changeable weather, you can use a pickaxe to collect stone and metal ore, and also use an axe for chopping down trees for the for use with the building component, the game demo has a full inventory system and the user interface is fully customisable with the sound and graphics as well as changing the input controls.

This will be a free demo at first in the hope it gains more interest to add more features and levels plus different abilities at a later stage, the current demo has 1 level which has a score counter as well as a timer for completing the game level, along with how many foes are left in the game.

This demo was built entirely in Epic's unreal Engine 5.03

Credits

Music and sound:- Iestyn Davis
UI and graphics:- Hristo Itchov
As well as the following from Epic Marketplace
Survival Game Kit V2 for the main character
Smart AI for the aliens
Paragon Twinblast
Paragon Sevarog
Assetville Town for the game map
Military Weap Silv for aded explosions and gun sounds
Sci fi sound pack for alien weapons and alien sounds in general
Ultra dynamic Sky for the day/night system as well as Weather system
Drivable Cars: Advanced Multiplayer Pack For the vehicles obviously
Breakable Glass, for obviously the breakable glass.
Easy Swim component.

name: Alien Town Invasion Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600/AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 12 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB/AMD Radeon R9 380 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400/AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB /AMD Radeon RX 590 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Shooter survival game demo, with a countdown timer where your objective is to save the town from the Alien invaders.
